name: Gurney Bay Hotel, A PARKROYAL Partner Hotel
detail: One of the best hotels in Penang. Hotel is quite old nut you don't feel it at all as it well maintained and kept by staff. Location is really best near to Gurty walk with easy access to all the well known locations of the island. Car park is quite comfortable and there is always available parking bay.

name: Hompton by the Beach Penang
detail: Had a wonderful stay here in the newest trendy hotel in Penang. First impression was splendid as we were greeted at the lobby and shown the way to the reception on level 11. Why was the reception located at such a high level, you ask? Why, to take our breaths away with the glorious seaview, of course. The pool area was huge and airy, almost wanted to sleep there and forget about the room! But what a room it was! Spacious, elegantly designed with comfort at the top of their priority. Water pressure was great, amenities well provided, perfect room temperature and a wide window to let us further appreciate the beauty of Penang. Staff were so helpful and friendly, always checking in to see that our needs were met, engaging in conversation, made us feel very welcomed! Breakfast spread was excellent, food still hot and freshly prepared despite our lateness in waking. Again, the F&B staff were so attentive and friendly. Couldn't have enjoyed myself more! Highly recommended!

name: M Social Resort Penang
detail: The breakfast was good got sea view from the coffee house.

name: Fifth Avenue Hotel
detail: Hotel is new, the staffs were great and friendly.

name: Hotel Penaga
detail: first time staying at peranakan boutique hotel in penang, i believe panaga is the best among all! when i first arrived at the hotel entrance, first sight of this old corner heritage building has already amazed me! designed by famous local architect hijjas kasturi, he make sure every corner of this hotel will suprise you! 3storey building, different theme disgin of every floor and every room! perfectly matching of old & new, give you such wonderful experince of stay! i like the traditional wooden blind window, allows perfect natural lighting shine into your room! try to request to stay on 3rd floor, extream high ceiling and nice deco. breakfast is awesome, especially the various of traditional nyonya kuih, ensure you fall into truly peranakan feeling. the small swimming is nice, best to chill yourself during hot weather.

name: Pink Cabana Hotel
detail: Wassup hostel is seriously one of the best hotels in Penang. The staff was quiet friendly and we also had a great time. The room was clean and although we wanted to use the stuff for washroom they did provided it on time. The best part was that they had a pool and it was neat and clean although there were children swimming in it but still it was clean. The gamming/playing area was also wonderful it was also amazing. I could have easily talked to my family there. The best thing was that they had a bus station behind the hotel and they also had the mall and all the other facilities near as well and we could easily go there and have fun and also do our shopping. The security was also amazing we had left our room keys out of the room in night and nothing happend. One of the best place in Penang is wassup youth Hostel. One must go there if visit to penang

name: OZO George Town Penang
detail: This newly built hotel is in the heart of Georgetown - within walkable distance to various night food markets. The view from the hotel is also magnificent, especially the view from the pool. I booked a family room however only realized at site that it is actually two individual rooms connected via a connecting door. And the connecting doors between two rooms open at a weird angle and no door stopper was provided - hence would recommend getting the suite instead for better and more comfortable stay. Check in process was extremely slow most likely due to the crowd during the christmas weekend. However I was extremely unsatisfied with the way the receptionist handled the situation. First I was informed upon arrival at 3.30PM (Noted check in opens at 3PM on the website) that the room will be available in 10 minutes. And yet my family and I waited for an extra 40 minutes until 4.20PM for the rooms. And there were no updates from the receptionist in between the wait. In the end I voiced out my unsatisfactory to the hotel team and was then only been provided with free breakfast for the next morning. In my humble opinion I appreciate honesty in customer service. The receptionist should be honest with the waiting time in order for customers to then make better choices with this spare time - we could have spent the waiting time at a nearby cafe/tourist attraction site instead. This was the only downfall of my stay. Otherwise the check out process was smooth, the hotel's rooms are great, parking is provided with automated car park and other hotel staffs I encountered were friendly and helpful too.

name: SAVV Hotel
detail: I had a long day on 5July due to malfunction of aircond at other hotel and had no choice to search for a new accommodation last minute. And I am so glad that I found SAVV. They provide services that beyond excellences. Wan provide us some local dessert while arranging our room, despite our last minute booking and late check in. Front desk colleague to the security guard at ground floor all are super friendly and they notice you right away and offer helps immediately. Housekeeping go extra miles to touch up your room cleanliness when I only requested to clear off the extra bed. This hotel is definitely a new Gem in Georgetown area. It is a hidden garden in the town and the spacious lovely room with Penang bridge view. I will definitely be back in the future with my new born baby and hope to meeting all this great people working here once again. Thank you so much for such a beautiful memories provided. Keep it up team!

name: The Prestige Hotel Penang, a Member of Design Hotels
detail: The Prestige, a newly hotel in Penang Island. The design for the hotel is incredible. From the lobby through the elevator and corridor to the room, each spot is exceptionally modern beauty design. The glasshouse cafe or restaurant where you can enjoy your welcome drink and breakfast here, the decor is really beauty and comfort. You can sit and enjoy your foods, chatting with others, taking selfie and it really felt warm. The hotel's breakfast is varied and delicious. The room is very special and nice decor, the water pressure is strong and shower in the bathroom is very comfortable. Even they provided high quality toiletries. There are many hidden light in the room, you can switch the feeling you want according to your preferences. A big screen Smart Tv is available in the room where you can listen songs or watch movies through Youtube. Beside that, the wifi is good too. I always seek for an extraordinary style for my vacation, and this really let me feel so great with overall.

name: The Granite Luxury Hotel Penang
detail: Firstly, I had stayed at this hotel together with my family members from 15 to 20 May 2019 and I must say that this hotel really made us feel like home. Not only are our apartments very spacious which provides us with more than enough space to place our belongings and also walk around comfortably but our apartments were also very clean and tidy. The simple wooden design of our apartments also gave us a very relaxing vibe. Most importantly, every apartment comes with a living room, a bedroom and an ensuite bathroom which is hard to find in Penang at an affordable price. Secondly, this hotel is being situated in George Town which makes travelling to many must visit places in the vicinity so much convenient. We are all very impressed with the automated carpark system in this hotel as well (the first of its kind in Penang). Lastly, the staff members working in this hotel were all very polite and friendly during our stay there. Will definitely recommend this hotel and stay there again =D
